# Touchstone Lightning (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Electricity Spells|electricity]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Druid Spells|Druid 4]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 8]], [[BoXM 8th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 8]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Effect:** One or more rays of electricity

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Planar Handbook (WotC), pg. 106

You can convert an unused usage of your higher-order planar touchstone ability into a ray of electricity (see the Planar Touchstone feat, *Planar Handbook 41*). This ray exhausts one use of your higher-order ability and deals 5d6 points of electricity damage to the target with a successful ranged touch attack.

For every five levels gained above 7th, you may fire one additional ray of electricity (to a maximum of three rays at 17th level). Each ray exhausts one of your higher-order ability uses.
